21375.「元ポツコン２号じゃねえですかッ！\n いいところに 来ましたッ！\n ちょっと:
Well, if it isn't Ex-Junkey #2! You came
at a great time! Check this out!

21376.「こいつは あの遺跡で拾ってきた\n 魔神兵とかいうガラクタの 一部なんですがね:
This piece of junk is an old Urbea Aztech.
If I sit down here like this...

21377.「イタタタッ！ 見てくだせえッ！\n とがった部分が しりっぺたの先に当たって…:
YEOUCH! The pointy part stabs you right in
the ass! It hurts something fierce, too!

21378.「ここにある たいがいのもんは\n イスぐらいには なりますが\n こいつは イ:
Most of the junk here is at least good as a
chair, but nobody's gonna wanna sit on
this...

21379.「こりゃ正真正銘の ガラクタでごぜえますよッ！\n こんな すばらしい物に めぐ:
This is a genuine piece of junk! I'm the
happiest Dwarf in all Dwachakka because I
found such a thing!

21384.「わわっ！ ダ ダストンさまっ！\n こいつ ガラクタのくせに しゃべってますよ: Whoa! Holy crap, Duston! The junk, it speaks!

21385.「エネルギー限界。\n 凍眠室 内部 危険。凍眠室 内部 危険……。:
Energy depleted. Error detected within
cryosleep chamber. Error detected...

21386.「緊急回避 装置 起動。\n 凍眠機能…… 解除 シマス。:
Emergency routine activated.
Cryosleep program canceled.

21387.「さ さすがの わしでも\n 死体は 勘弁でごぜえますよ……？: Eeeyah! Even I don't want a corpse!

21391.「……ほほう。ウルベアの魔の手より\n 余を救ってくれたのは そちたちじゃな。\:
I see. It was you who saved me from the
clutches of Urbea. Don't worry. You will
be rewarded for your service.

21392.「い いきなり出てきて エラそうに……。\n アンタ いったい 何者でごぜえます:
Just who do you think you are, popping out
of that box with such an attitude?

21393.「これは 異なことを……。\n ドワーフでありながら 余を知らぬとな？\n ……:
How is it possible that you are a Dwarf and
yet you do not know me? Hm. It's good for
you that I'm a tolerant man.

21394.「ならば 我が名を聞いて おそれおののくのだ！\n 余は かのガテリア皇国の 正:
Then, hear my name and tremble! I am Byan Dao
the First Prince, rightful heir to the throne
of Gateria!

21396.「あ…あまり反応が ないな。\n ……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。:
Ah...not much response. Well, that's fine. I'm
a tolerant man, after all.

21397.「おおっ！ そうじゃッ！\n こうしては おれん！\n 囚われの リウ老師を救わ:
Oh, but I don't have time for this! I must
save Master Liu!

21398.「そち！ 奇妙な身なりをしているものの\n なかなか ウデが立つと見たぞよ。\n:
You, there! Despite your looks, you have
an aura of... competency about you. I have a
favor to ask of one such as you.

21399.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には\n 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が\n:
Deep within the Urbea Empire, my tutor
Master Liu is being held prisoner just as
I was.

21400.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き\n リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてく:
As much as I dread returning to that place,
I can't possibly leave him behind. If you
accompany me there, you shall be rewarded.

21401.「うむ！ 苦しゅうない！\n そち 名は なんと申す？\n ……そうか <pc>:
Mmm. Don't worry. Tell me your name.
I see... you are known as <pc>.

21402.「それでは <pc>よ！\n 反重力飛行装置を 持ってまいれ！\n ウルベアまで:
Then let us be off! Get your anti-gravity
flight device ready, as Urbea is only
a quick flight away!

21404.「……コホン。どうした？\n 反重力飛行装置を 知らぬわけではあるまい？\n ほ:
From that look on your face, I surmise you
have no idea what I'm talking about. Then I
shall word it differently.

21405.「まさか……！\n ここには 反重力飛行装置がないと申すか！？<yesno><c:
Is there anything in this place that can be
used to take flight?<yesno><close>

21406.「ちょっと 元ポツコン２号さん！\n この部屋にあるのは ガラクタだけで\n そ:
Ex-Junkey #2, you know all we have here is
junk. Nothing useful or convenient, and
definitely nothing that flies!

21407.「言われてみれば 確かに……。\n ここにいる者の身なりは 相当 貧相……。\n:
Now that I get a proper look, you're all
dressed so poorly... I see. This must be part
of the slums, then.

21408.「すまぬ。余の配慮が 足りなかったわ。\n ならば いたしかたなし。\n 地下帝:
My apologies. I was not paying attention, and
made assumptions about your status. We shall
go on foot to the Underground City.

21409.「それでは <pc>よ。\n ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。\n 余は そち:
Please lead the way to the Urbea Underground
City, <pc>. I will follow right
behind you.

21410.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。\n 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋:
When you reach the city, head for the
basement. Master Liu should be in a room in
the back of the B3F.

21411.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
Mmmh. It seems you're doing too many favors
for the lower classes to accept my request.

21412.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。\n とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ:
Oh, well. I'm a tolerant man. However, the
situation is time sensitive. Please help me
with the request as soon as possible.

21413.「なんと！ 余の頼みを 断ると申すか！\n 我がガテリア皇国の威光を\n おそれ:
How dare you! How could you refuse a request
on behalf of the Kingdom of Gateria?!

21414.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。\n とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ:
Oh, well. I'm a tolerant man. However, the
time is short. If you change your mind, come
back.

21415.「おお 待っておったぞ！\n ここにいる者に まともに話せる者はおらぬ。\n 頼:
Oh, I've been waiting for you! No one here has
their head on straight. You're the only one I
can count on.

21416.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には\n 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が\n:
Deep within the Urbea Empire, my tutor
Master Liu is being held prisoner just as
I was.

21417.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き\n リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてく:
As much as I dread returning to that place,
I can't possibly leave him behind. If you
accompany me there, you shall be rewarded.

21418.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には\n 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が\n:
Deep within the Underground City of Urbea,
my tutor Master Liu is being held prisoner
just like I was.

21419.「そちには 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き\n リウ老師を救出する 手助けをして:
I need you to lead me to the Urbea Underground
City and help me rescue Master Liu.

21420.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。\n 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋:
When you reach the city, head for the
basement. Master Liu should be in a room in
the back of the B3F.

21421.「反重力飛行装置がないのは\n いささか不便じゃが いたしかたなし。\n 地下帝:
The lack of anti-gravity flight equipment is
somewhat inconvenient, but it is what it is.
Let's go on foot to the underground empire.

21422.「それでは <pc>よ。\n ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。\n 余は そち:
<pc>, please lead the way to the
Urbea Underground Empire. I will follow right
behind you.

21423.「ハア ハア……。待ちや <pc>。\n いったい どれほど 余を歩かせるのじゃ:
*gasp* *gasp* , please... hold up. I'm afraid I can't... walk a step further without a
break...

21424.「ところで <pc>よ。\n そちは 来る場所を まちがえておらぬか？:
And... I think you've led me to the wrong
place...

21425.「進めども 進めども ガレキの山……。\n 余の知っておる ウルベア地下帝国は\:
Nothing but rubble, no matter where I look...
Covered in dust, forgotten by time. This...
This can't be Urbea.

21426.「深く 広く 掘られた空洞には\n 虹色に輝く宝石で 装飾された家屋が並び\n:
Where are the canyons, dredged by dwarven machines? The ornately decorated houses, covered in jewels? And, I haven't even
seen a single flight device...

21427.「のう <pc>よ。\n ここが その大陸随一の大国と うたわれた\n ウルベア:
<pc>, do you truly mean to tell me
that this sorry heap is Urbea, the greatest
power on the entire continent of Dwachakka?!
<yesno><close>

21428.「ならば なぜ かような場所に\n 余を 連れてきた！\n 連れてきたには それ:
Then why did you bring me to such a place! You
must have had a good reason for bringing me
here!

21429.「これは異なことを……。余は 信じられぬ。\n あの 栄華を誇った地下帝国が\n:
I cannot believe it. Why does that glorious
underground empire look like this?

21430.<pc>は ビャン・ダオに\nこの場所が ウルベア地下帝国の\n遺跡であることを:
<pc> explained to Byan Dao that this
place was the site of the Urbea Underground
Ruins.

21431.「なん…じゃと……！？\n ここは ウルベア地下帝国の遺跡じゃと？\n 遺跡とい:
Ruins? Did I hear you correctly? This place
is the Urbea Underground Ruins?! Then, what
you're telling me is...

21433.「なんということじゃ……。\n 余は…… 余は かの帝国が滅びるまで\n 魔神兵:
Then I must have slumbered within that Aztech
as the empire perished...

21434.「な ならば ガテリアは どうじゃ！？\n <pc>よ！ そちは ガテリア皇国の:
Then, tell me of Gateria. Do you know what
fate awaited the Kingdom of Gateria?<yesno><close>

21435.「おおっ！ 知っておると申すか！\n ならば 余に 話してみい！\n ガテリアは:
Oh! You recognize that name? Then tell me,
tell me about what Gateria is like now!

21436.「…………………………。\n 何も 答えられぬではないか。\n クチから出まかせ: ...Don't lie to me! Not about this!

21437.「……そうか。何も 知らぬのじゃな。\n すなわち ガテリアも ウルベア同様\n:
You don't know, then. But I understand.
Gateria, like Urbea, no longer exists.

21438.「父上も 母上も もう……。\n そんな…… そんな…………。:
Then my father and mother are... they're...
gone...

21439.「……すまぬ。一国の皇子である 余が\n 情けない姿を さらしてしもうた……。\:
I am sorry. I, a prince, have acted in a way
unfitting of royalty. Please forgive me.

21440.「だが そちの話を聞いて\n あらゆることに 合点がいったわ。:
After listening to you, everything makes sense
now.

21441.「下々の者が ガテリアの威光に ひれふさぬのも\n 反重力飛行装置を 目にしない:
None of the low-class citizens have bowed to
me. I haven't seen a single flight device,
and everyone dresses so strangely...

21442.「すべて 時の流れの中で\n 我らの文明が 失われてしまったため……。:
All because in the course of time, our great
civilization was lost...

21443.「……つまりは グルヤンラシュ！\n きゃつの思い通りになったということか……！:
Guryan Rush! You got what you wanted, you
bastard!

21444.「……<pc> そちに聞かせたい話がある。\n 余が この時代に来る前の話じゃ…:
...<pc>, I have a story to tell you.
A story from before I came to this time...

21445.「かつて この大陸には ふたつの大国があった。\n 余が 国王となるはずだった:
There were once two great nations on this
continent. The Kingdom of Gateria, of which I
was to be king, and this empire of Urbea.

21446.「ふたつの国は 他の種族を圧倒する技術力を有し\n そこに住まう者たちは なに不:
The two countries had technology that
surpassed that of the other races, and their
inhabitants lived in peace and tranquility.

21447.「あの乱世の使者 奸臣グルヤンラシュが\n ウルベア地下帝国に 現れるまでは……:
Until the emissary of bloodshed, the wicked
Guryan Rush, showed up in the Urbea Empire!

21448.「グルヤンラシュは 高潔な神官の身なりで現れ\n ウルベア皇帝に取り入ると\n:
Guryan Rush appeared in the guise of a virtuous priest and won the trust of the Emperor of Urbea, manipulating the two
countries into war.

21449.「その戦いの中 多くの技術者が散り\n たがいの技術と技術が ぶつかり合って\n:
In the course of that war, many of our great minds were lost, and as technology collided with technology, civilization fell into
decay...

21450.「……そう！ 我らの文明の喪失は\n すべて グルヤンラシュの奸計によるもの！\:
The loss of our civilization was all due to
the wiles of Guryan Rush. His terrible
schemes brought both countries down!

21451.「……そして 行き過ぎた 戦いの果てに\n 余は 命の危険に さらされた。\n:
That terrible war put me in mortal peril. But
Master Liu saved me.

21452.「父上も母上も もう生きては いまい。\n じゃが リウ老師だけは\n 今も ど:
My parents are long gone, this I know. But I
believe Master Liu still lives.

21453.「老師は 余が この時代に来る前に\n 余の後を追って 魔神兵に乗ると\n 約束:
He promised that he would climb into one of
those Urbea Aztechs and follow right behind
me.

21454.「じゃが ここに老師は いない様子……。\n 余は ひとまず あのガラクタ屋敷に:
But since he doesn't seem to be here, I shall
return to that ramshackle house for now and
think about what to do next.

21455.「<pc>よ これは ほうびじゃ。\n この時代に価値があるかは わからぬが\n:
This is a reward for you, <pc>. I
don't know if it's worth anything in this day
and age, but accept it gratefully.

21456.「<pc>……。\n そちは 信頼に値する者だと わかった。\n 余が 困ったと:
I have found you to be one worthy of my trust.
If I am ever in trouble, please lend me your
hand again.

21457.「リウ老師……。\n そなたは どこへ行ったのだ？\n 余を 時の激流に 押しや:
Master Liu... where did you go? You left me
behind in the ravages of time...
